description:
This single-sided SPD pedal is optimized for urban cycling, with a light action binding that makes for easy entry and exit. The platform is sleek and lightweight, and provides lots of stability when paired with a commuting or touring-oriented shoe. The open design sheds mud, making this a good choice for adventurous cycling tours that venture onto the odd dirt road or singletrack.

  • Shimano's lightest SPD pedal
  • Designed for urban cycling and touring
  • Body is lightweight aluminum
  • Chromoly spindle with stainless steel spring
  • Upgraded seals minimize maintenance
  • Axle can be accessed with a single wrench for easy service
  • Includes SM-SH51 cleats
name: Shimano PD-ES600 SPD Pedals
